summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Makeup Blender Sponge Set - 4 Pack Latex Free Q-Soft Makeup Beauty Foundation Blending Sponge Flawless Smooth Brush for Liquid Foundation BB Creams Powders Concealer (4 Pack)
Review Date: 2019/02/21
Store: FRESHME
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Brand': 'FRESHME', 'Color': 'Ivory', 'Material': 'Rubber', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.6 x 3.6 x 1.4 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '681413196902', 'Manufacturer': 'FRESHME'}
Review Text: I like the size and shape of these sponges, specially for application of foundation. I use liquid foundation and I noticed that the sponge was soaking up the makeup. I started using these only to apply powdered makeup like rouge or shimmer and they work very well.
Review Title: good for powder but not liquid makeup
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Manicure and Pedicure Nail Clipper from POWERGROOMING - Powerful Trimmer for Thick and Thin Finger Nails and Toe Nails - Included Nail File and"Catcher" for Easy Cleanup (1 Pack)
Review Date: 2020/02/17
Store: POWERGROOMING
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Brand': 'POWERGROOMING', 'Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Blade Edge': 'Straight', 'Blade Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Target Audience': 'Women, Men', 'Package Dimensions': '3.8 x 1.3 x 1 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'UPC': '653233212735', 'Manufacturer': 'POWERGROOMING'}
Review Text: This has been one of my favorite nail clippers I have used. It cuts with precision, even toenails that are thick or semi ingrown. curvature of clip is wide so it will not clip nails leaving edges, and you do not have to use more than once per nail except toe nail. I also like the little case that does with it and the curved body gives thumb more leverage to hold in place when clipping. It comes with a nail filer but I didn't find much use for it.
Review Title: Strong clipping power, case is great for traveling
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Grinding Away Skin Polishing Scrub, 3 fl. oz., Polishing Scrub Works to Improve Skin's Texture and Tone by Buffing Away Dead Skin Cells by Higher Education Skincare
Review Date: 2020/10/11
Store: Higher Education
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Higher Education', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoother', 'Material Feature': 'Gluten Free, Cruelty Free', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.59 x 3.58 x 1.61 inches; 3 Ounces', 'UPC': '811381031008'}
Review Text: Although the Higher Education facial scrub has a bit of a chemical induced rather than fragrant smell, its texture and cleansing power is great at getting rid of dead skin cells and dull patches. My skin feels refreshed and truly soft after using, without need to resort to facial cloths to do the scrubbing. A double pea size amount goes a long way for scrubbing face and neck, so amount will last a long while. 4/5.
Review Title: Pleased with scrubbing properties, smells a little chemically
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Moisturizing Facial Emulsion for Restoring Hydrating Smoothing Skin from Manilla Natural Skincare
Review Date: 2020/12/27
Store: Manilla Natural Skincare
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Manilla Natural Skincare', 'Scent': 'Coconut', 'Item Form': 'Serum', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Fl Oz', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.5 x 1.5 x 5.9 inches; 2.19 Ounces'}
Review Text: The nudity facial emulsion absorbs quirkily and without leaving residue. With a lightly scented floral fragrance, it feels and smells refreshing. However, moisture is short lasting if you have dry prone skin and would recommend adding a longer lasting moisturizer if you need good moisture for an 8 hour day.
Review Title: light, fast absorbing
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Castor Oil (60ml) - w/Free Lash and Brow Brushes,Pure Castor Oil for Hair,Eyelashs,Eyebrows,Skin,Hair Growth and Face, Birthday Gifts for Women Men
Review Date: 2021/07/18
Store: ELBBUB
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Hair Type': 'Aging', 'Material Type Free': 'Chemical Free', 'Scent': 'Natural', 'Liquid Volume': '60 Milliliters', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Package Dimensions': '4.9 x 1.8 x 1.8 inches; 4.8 Ounces'}
Review Text: I have been using this castor oil to promote hair growth and calm the itchiness and discomfort of my scalp due to issues with dandruff. a few drops help soothe my scalp and after some consistent use, I notice that my hair falls out less than before when brushing it. It is a legitimately unrefined oil when compared to other less expensive brands for the amount, this one is less sticky and darker, and the darkened bottle allows for good preservation from UV rays.
Review Title: quality oil for hair/ scalp, good packaging
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: MHSY Electric Razor for Women, 3 in 1 Womens Shaver for Pubic Hair Wet & Dry Painless Cordless Hair Removal Shaver for Shaving Legs, Bikini Trimmer Line, Arms and Underarms
Review Date: 2021/07/19
Store: MHSY
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Brand': 'MHSY', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Back Hair, Pubic, Armpit', 'Special Feature': '普通', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Included Components': 'Cleaning Brush, Battery', 'Package Dimensions': '7.8 x 5.43 x 2.17 inches; 3.84 Ounces', 'Batteries': '1 AAAA batteries required. (included)', 'UPC': '616908499251', 'Manufacturer': 'MHSY'}
Review Text: This MHSY Electric Razor for Women does not require, or specify in the instructions, about using shaving cream or oil. It does not state anything was needed, so I did not use anything. My leg hair was quite long when I used it the first time, and it shaved pretty well. When I went to use it again, even the strongest blade setting, it did not seem to be getting the hair for a close enough shave. So it seemed to do well when the hair is longer. It gave me ingrown hair bumps in some areas. I am not sure if it's not due to not using a lubricant or not. It holds pretty well in the shower. But I don't think it's supposed to be used while you are showering. It is very light to hold. I appreciate the left and right blades for sensitive areas, however, the curve around the middle blade has no use. I am not sure what its purpose is for, as much as I have tried to figure it out, it seems to do nothing. The battery lasts quite a while, as I have had it for about a month and only needed to charge it once.
Review Title: Does a good job shaving long hairs, but struggles to get close shave after
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Terre De Mars Resonance Facial Oil, Certified Organic, Plumping and Nourishing Oil for Men and Women, Infused With Coffee and Evening Primrose Oil to Protect and Illuminate Skin, Perfect for All Skin Types, Made in France, Vegan and Cruelty Free (1 FL Oz)
Review Date: 2021/10/05
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'TERRE DE MARS', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Active Ingredients': 'caffeine,squalane', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Product Dimensions': '1.34 x 1.34 x 4.25 inches; 2.89 Ounces'}
Review Text: The Terre de Mars oil serum is a nice emulsion made partly of primrose oil and caffeine with the purpose of brightening and hydrating the facial area for several hours. After each morning use of a few drops, my face is hydrated for the rest of the day and the moisture it provides is even more long-lasting in more humid/hot weather. Although not too viscous, it can become sticky if you apply more than necessary, so a small amount is enough to give your skin the desired effects. Also perfect for sensitive skin and it has a very very faint floral smell that is undetectable soon after applying.
Review Title: Perfect viscosity for face, a little goes a long way
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
**Shopping Preferences Summary:**

- **Makeup Tools:** Prefers multifunctional beauty tools; uses blending sponges primarily for powder application and shows a preference for products offering specific benefits.
  
- **Nail Care:** Values precision and effectiveness in grooming tools, with a focus on quality nail clippers that offer strong performance, indicating an interest in personal grooming and hygiene.

- **Skin Care:** Shows a strong preference for scrubs and facial oils that improve skin texture and hydration. Prefers products that absorb quickly and provide lasting moisture but is critical of scents that may not be pleasant.

- **Hair Care:** Interested in natural, effective oils for hair and scalp health, particularly seeking solutions to common hair issues and valuing quality ingredients.

- **Shaving Products:** Selective about shaving tools, looking for effective hair removal while having concerns about skin sensitivity and post-use issues like ingrown hairs.

Overall, this shopper exhibits a keen interest in personal care and beauty products that combine effectiveness with quality, while also emphasizing specific functionalities and avoiding unpleasant sensory experiences.

target_interaction.title: Skin friendly paint, wide range of colors, perfect size brushes for detail painting
target_interaction.text: The Bvendano face paint kit comes just as shown, with 3 color paint strips per pot. A small amount of water is all that is needed to make  the liquid paste paint , and the 2 sized brushes are most suitable to detailed painting. The 3  paint strips per pot don’t easily mix together when dipping moist brush in it, except for the white paint tones, some which are next to very dark tones and do stain the white paint strips. The paint is high quality as it doesn’t crack once dried on skin, and does not cause an allergic reaction on sensitive skin. All in all I’m quite pleased with the product.
target_interaction.title_meta: BVENDANO Split Cake Face Paint Make Up Palette Set Professional 10 Large Water Based Colors Non Toxic Rainbow Body Paint for Halloween Parties Art Theater and Cosplay
